title: Re: 15 years since Guybrush washed up the shores of Melee Is
content:
Jazz: Hah! I don't believe this! DooM 3 needs an entire CD's worth of space! My game didn't even fill half of one!

Keen: Oh yeah? Well back in my day we only had 16 colors, we were trailblazers back then I tell you!

Guybrush: Whatever nooBsA proud member of the signature stealing society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: 15 years since Guybrush washed up the shores of Melee Is
content: wow! that's amazing & i still play it 15 years later after it was released
